'''Cavern''' is a map for ''[[Battle (mini game)|Battle]]''. It is one of the first maps to be added to ''Battle''. It has four sizes: small, medium (usually the default) large, and large+.

== Summary ==

Cavern holds many overhanging vines, ruins and a overall stony look with water features.

== Spawn ==
Players by default spawn around and face the cornucopia equidistance apart. Players are chosen randomly on which spawn point they are placed on.

=== Default (Medium) ===
* 268, 28, -1
* 277, 28, 3
* 281, 28, 12
* 277, 28, 21
* 268, 28, 25
